MDB Content Editor

This example show you have to use content editor. It's very easy to use. You have 3 buttons and each buttons have own functions.

First button will active a editor and if you will have active input in table data after click that button with active td will be disabled until you click again on button or when you will use sorting option.

Second button will add new table row on the first DataTable page (always). If you will have inactive editor new table row will be disabled.

Third button will remove first table row on the first DataTable page (always) after click or if you will have selected table data with input field, that button will remove selected table data with whole table row.
